analysis.description: ERC865Token.recover (/unique_chucks/5/0x59ae863232238a8bd7953bdfc1b4796f8e9a5b4e.sol#641-672) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/5/0x59ae863232238a8bd7953bdfc1b4796f8e9a5b4e.sol:
	Contract TipToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/5/0x59ae863232238a8bd7953bdfc1b4796f8e9a5b4e.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
TipToken.setAlias.alias (local variable @ /unique_chucks/5/0x59ae863232238a8bd7953bdfc1b4796f8e9a5b4e.sol) shadows built-in symbol "alias"
